QuestData.Title: Mulverick's Offer of Service
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: New to the rank of Blademaster, Na'Shra is a formidable warrior and master of arms.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, hero, I owe you both my life and my honor. I ask that you allow me to repay this debt by serving under your command.$b$bYou will find that I am a fearsome hunter. I have also mastered the art of riding the rylaks, which few among the Frostwolves can claim.$b$bWill you accept my service?
